message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and provide substantial return on your investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the product's value while also being mindful of my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $1,750,000. This adjustment reflects the product's true worth and potential for significant returns.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,300,000. This price seems more reasonable to me, considering the product's value and my financial constraints.
